altTitles.en: That Year We... Early Summer Is Great!

description.en:
At Midsummer High, Yeon-Su Guk is at the top of her class, while Wung Choi is ranked dead-last. And it’s not just their grades -- their personalities couldn’t be more different, as Yeon-Su is a no-nonsense stickler and Wung is a care-free slacker. When a filmmaker comes to make a documentary about their school life over the course of a month, they’re not exactly thrilled to be spending so much time together. However, as the month goes on, they begin to discover each other’s hidden depths. At least one thing’s for certain - they’ll never forget this summer!

Note:

This webtoon is a prequel to the Kdrama, Our Beloved Summer, the webtoon will focus on Choi Wung and Guk Yeonsu in their high school days.

title.en: I Turned off the Pain Perception Setting!

altTitles.en: I Said I Turned off the Pain Perception Setting!
I'm Telling You, I Already Turned off the Pain Perception Setting!
You Turned off the Pain Setting?
I Turned off the Pain Setting?

altTitles.ja: 100回目プレイヤーなので高好感度はエンリョします！

altTitles.es-la: ¿Se me ha olvidado desactivar la configuración del dolor?

description.en:
**Pain perception 0, capture rate is 100!**

A virtual reality game with pain perception set to '0'. I was the first to clear all endings, and started the final 100th playthrough... but something is off. Suddenly, I have a strange disease with a terminal setting, and the capture target characters are starting to worry about me.

"I don't feel any pain, so should I pretend to be sick?"

Before I knew it, to the capture target characters, I became a noble hero enduring pain and sacrificing for world peace. Since it has come to this, the concept for this playthrough is a terminally-ill hero throwing herself for the world! I must end it with a happy ending. This is my last playthrough in my life!

title.en: Traveling Through Time and Space to Become an Unlucky NPC: I Have a Wife to Protect Me

altTitles.zh: 穿越成倒霉NPC: 我有老婆罩着

description.en: He Qingyang traveled to the game "Sword Immortal Legend" he was playing and became an unlucky NPC who kept skipping the plot when he was playing the game. This NPC kept harassing the main heroine Ning Yiwan, and later his identity was exposed and he was killed by Ning Yiwan.....

description.en: Arikawa Ougi, 16 years old, suddenly found himself reincarnated as a zombie?! Embarking on a journey to subjugate the Demon Lord as a zombie hero, but the use of "power" requires a "price"...? A dark fantasy in another world.
description.ja: 【異世界×グロ×バトル】　転生先は、まさかのゾンビ！？　勇者ゾンビとして魔王討伐の旅に出るも、《力》の使用には《代償》が必要で…？　異世界系ダークファンタジー

altTitles.en: Bad Maids

description.en: Julia, who was born an orphan, was killed in exchange for falling in love with the Young Master of the Marjoram Family. But when she opened her eyes, at the same location as any other day, she was rescued by the Commander of the Imperial Army, ‘Carus’... She was hit by a curse of being unable to die, and this is now her eighth life. After realizing that she would be stuck in the loop forever if she didn't take down the Marquis, she became a servant within the Palace to utilize the Royal Family’s power to demolish the Marjoram Family in her eighth life. “Isn’t this how we’re supposed to plot revenge?”

altTitles.ja: みーちゃんは飼われたい

altTitles.en: Mi-chan Wants to be Kept

description.en: Iori is a young man in his twenties who has been stressed at work, lost his cat that he had kept for many years, and is suffering from insomnia and loss of appetite. The next morning, he finds a beautiful, naked girl lying beside him...?
description.ja: 〈ウルトラジャンプ連載作品〉仕事のストレスに加え、長年飼った飼い猫を失い不眠＆食欲不振ぎみのアラサー青年いおり。疲れ切った夜、迷い込んできた黒猫を家にあげて世話すると、翌朝、全裸の美少女が横に寝ていて…‼︎?？「あたしを飼わせてあげる」ーー強引勝手気ままな彼女の正体は…？？
description.uk:
"Ми їстимемо разом, спатимемо разом і поліпшуватимемо якість життя Іорі разом".

Іорі - молодий чоловік, який на додачу до стресу на роботі ще й колись втратив улюблену кішку, а тепер страждає від безсоння й анорексії. І ось одного ранку він виявляє, що поруч з ним спить красива оголена незнайомка...

Надзвичайна героїня-цілителька та жалюгідний чоловік, який дуже любить котів, починають жити разом!

altTitles.en: Eastern Thorned Poet Hermit ~ Wild and Horned Hermit.
WaHH

altTitles.ru: Тохо Ибаракасэн ~ Дикий и Рогатый Отшельник

altTitles.ja: 東方茨歌仙　～ Wild and Horned Hermit.

altTitles.de: Der Rosenpoet des Ostens ~ Wild and Horned Hermit.

altTitles.uk: Тохо Ібаракасен ~ Дика та Рогата Відлюдниця

description.en:
In this 10 volume official Touhou series, spanning the time period of nine long years between the UFO and WBaWC games, we follow the misadventures of the business inept shrine maiden Reimu Hakurei and her ever-curious friend Marisa Kirisame, who meet a mysterious, young hermit woman named Ibara Kasen.  
  
Upon seeing how sloppily the Hakurei Shrine conducts its business, she decides to become a regular shrine visitor, determined to lend her near unlimited wisdom to the shrine maiden, in order to make her place a proper Shinto Shrine. Does the nagging, yet well meaning hermit bring nothing but good-will with her advice, or is there something more sinister hiding behind the friendly face and her bandaged arm?
description.pt:
De Zun, Wild and Horned Hermit é o último mangá da série Touhou, seguindo os passos de Silent Sinner in Blue, Inaba the Moon & Inaba the Earth e a triologia Sangetsusei.  
Desta vez, Marisa encontra uma misteriosa eremita fora da aldeia humana, No entanto, ela contou para Reimu sobre essa mulher, sendo vista ao redor do Santuário, ela é Ibara Kasen, uma estranha asceta com um braço enfaixado por causa de uma certa habilidade desconhecida da natureza, cujo mantem uma disciplina mais consciente do que elas e de qualquer um em Gensokyo.

title.en: Lord Demon King Always Teases Me

altTitles.zh-ro: Mo Wang Da Ren Zong Liao Wo

altTitles.ko: 게임 속 마왕이 자꾸 날 괴롭혀!

altTitles.zh-ro: Mó Wáng Dà Rén Zǒng Liāo Wǒ

description.en: He Mian, a college student who has social anxiety, cleared his favorite game for the 100th time. Gareth, the devil of the game, accidentally transmigrated into the modern world where He Mian was. He Mian is determined to let the devil return to the game as soon as possible. In order to get rid of Gareth's pranks and entanglement, the two must collect magical artifacts from the game which has been spread across the world when Gareth was traversing.

altTitles.ja: ヤンキー娘
帰ってください！ 阿久津さん

altTitles.zh: 请你回去吧！阿久津同学

altTitles.it: Per favore torna a casa, Akutsu-san!

altTitles.vi: Cút mẹ về nhà đi Akutsu!

altTitles.pt-br: Por favor vá para casa, Akutsu-san!

description.en:
Ooyama-kun normally doesn’t get involved with Akutsu-san, a delinquent girl in his class, but for some reason she makes his house her hang-out place!

Will she do something horrible to him behind closed doors or will he chase her out? But dealing with Akutsu-san’s sexy, cute behavior in such a confined space… he’s sure to get flustered! He wants her to go home, but he also doesn’t?

A teasing comedy under a single roof!
description.it: Ooyama-kun normalmente non si fa coinvolgere da Akutsu-san, una ragazza delinquente della sua classe, ma per qualche motivo lei fa della sua casa il suo luogo di ritrovo!  Ooyama le farà qualcosa di orribile a porte chiuse o la caccerà fuori? Tuttavia aver a che fare con il comportamento sexy e carino di Akutsu-san in uno spazio così ristretto... è sicuro che si ecciterà!  Vuole che lei torni a casa e allo stesso tempo non vuole,  Una commedia stuzzicante sotto lo stesso tetto!
description.ja:
**俺の部屋がヤンキー娘のたまり場に!? ヤンキー×非リア充のからかいコメディ！**

普段は全く関わりのないクラスの不良女子・阿久津さんに何故か家をたまり場にされてしまった一人暮らしの大山くん。ガラの悪い阿久津さんに何かひどいことをされるのではと追い出そうとするのだが、無防備で距離感の近い彼女のエロカワイイ仕草にドギマギしてしまい…？ 帰ってほしいのに、帰ってほしくない!? 一つ屋根の下のからかいショートコメディ！

---

**Ore no heya ga yankī musume no tamariba ni!? Yankī × hi riajū no karakai komedi!**

Fudan wa mattaku kakawari no nai kurasu no furyō joshi Akutsu-san ni nazeka ie o tamariba ni sa rete shimatta hitorigurashi no Ōyama-kun. Gara no warui Akutsu-san ni nanika hidoi koto o sa reru node wa to oidasou to suru nodaga, mubōbi de kyori-kan no chikai kanojo no erokawaī shigusa ni dogimagi shite shimai…? Kaette hoshī no ni, kaette hoshikunai! ? Hitotsu yane no shita no karakai shōtokomedi!
description.ru:
Оояма-кун обычно не связывается с Акуцу-сан, девушкой-правонарушителем в его классе, но по каким-то причинам она делает его дом своим тусовочным заведением! Оояма сделает с ней что-нибудь ужасное за закрытыми дверями или он её прогонит? Он хочет, чтобы она пошла домой, но не хочет? Дразнящая комедия под одной крышей!  
  
**Notes:**   
- Yankee Musume (ヤンキー娘) is the pre-serialization name.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/NAGAOKA0)  
- [Artist's Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=133935)
description.es-la: Ooyama-kun normalmente no se involucra con Akutsu-san, una chica yankee de su clase, ¡pero por alguna razón ella hace de su casa su lugar de reunión! ¿Ooyama le hará algo horrible cuando estén las puertas cerradas o la echará? Pero lidiar con el sexy y lindo comportamiento de Akutsu en un espacio tan reducido sera un problema…
description.pt-br: Ooyama geralmente não se envolve com com Akutsu-san, uma garota delinquente da sua turma, mas por alguma razão ela transformou o quarto dele no seu local de descanso! Será que ela vai fazer algo horrível para ele ou ele vai expulsar ela? Mas lidar com a sexy e fofa Akutsu-san em um espaço fechado... Ele com certeza vai ficar envergonhado! Ooyama quer que ela vá para casa, mas ele também não quer? Uma comédia provocante sob um mesmo teto!

altTitles.ja: お狐ギャルの片喰さん

description.en:
A very ordinary and serious high school student, Kamou-kun.
Though his days are filled with diligent study, his concern lies in his childhood friend, Katabami-san, who interferes with his studies every day. And to make matters more complicated, Katabami-san's true identity is... a fox spirit!?

The struggle between Kamou-kun, who doesn't want to be bothered, and Katabami-san, who craves attention, begins anew today!

---

**Alternative Raw:** [Nico Nico Seiga](https://sp.seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/66393)

altTitles.ja: しかのこのこのここしたんたん

altTitles.en: My Deer Friend Nokotan

description.en:
No one knows Torako used to be a delinquent. All of her classmates only know her as the perfect student. But everything changes when Nokotan, a transfer student with antlers, enters her life. Antlers aren’t the only thing strange about Nokotan. Her deer nose can sniff out Torako’s secret past! Whether it’s at school or the zoo, chaos follows this doe-eyed girl’s every step. Torako has so many questions! Is Nokotan a deer, a girl, or something in-between?

Trivia:
- The author is the illustrator/'mama' for Hololive Vtuber [Amane Kanata (天音かなた)](https://www.youtube.com/@AmaneKanata). Because of this, physical copies on Amazon sold out within a day.
description.ja: 出会いはある朝、彼女のツノが電線に引っかかっていたから………!?うっかり変なツノの生えた女の子を助けたことで優等生（の皮を被った）虎視虎子の人生が大混乱に!?一人の少女（元ヤン）が一人のシカ（？）に出会うガール・ミーツ・シカ物語（コメディ）開幕!!

description.en: What happens when a girl from a quaint and small town meets the son of a Yakuza crime lord? Will she be able to change him for the better or will he continue down the dangerous and violent path?

title.en: Ossan Teihen Chiyu-shi to Manasume no Henkyou Life

altTitles.ja: おっさん底辺治癒士と愛娘の辺境ライフ ～中年男が回復スキルに覚醒して、英雄へ成り上がる～

altTitles.en: The Frontier Life of The Low-Class Ossan Healer And The Lovely Girl
The Frontier Life of the Low-Class Old Man Healer and His Beloved Daughter
Old Man, the Low-tier Healer, and the Beloved Daughter's Frontier Life ~A Middle-aged Man Awakens to Healing Skills and Rises to Become a Hero~

description.en: F-rank healer, Reda Dixon (30), is expelled from his party due to his age. Heartbroken, Reda decides on a change of pace by moving to the rural town of Almus. On his journey there, he encounters a blonde-haired girl named Mina, who is dressed in ragged clothes. With no parents in sight, the kind-hearted Reda decides to become her guardian. In Almus, Reda, who starts a new life with the girl, becomes known as "Teacher" by the townspeople, thanks to his unconsciously cheat-level 『Healing Magic』! Together, they solve various troubles and deepen their family bonds.
description.ja: Fランクの治癒士、レダ・ディクソン(30)は、年齢を理由にパーティーから追放されてしまう。傷心のレダは心機一転、田舎町・アムルスへの移住を決意。その道中で、みすぼらしい恰好をしたブロンドヘアの少女・ミナと出会う。アムルスで、少女とともに新生活を始めたレダは、無自覚チートだった『回復魔法』のおかげで町民から“先生”と呼ばれる存在までに!二人は様々なトラブルを解決するとともに、家族の絆を深めていく―。
description.ru: Рэда Диксон, 30 летний лекарь F ранга, который был отстранен от службы из-за возраста. От безысходности он решает переехать в Загородную деревушку Амурт для того, чтобы начать жизнь с чистого листа. По стечениям обстоятельств он встречает Мину, маленькую девочку со светлыми волосами, одетую в одни лохмотья. Родителей у нее нет, поэтому добродушный Рэда становится ей опекуном. Благодаря магии исцеления Рэды, все в поселке называют его "Сенсеем". Рэда и его семья вместе решают проблемы и укрепляют семейные связи.

altTitles.ja: 異世界もふもふカフェ

altTitles.en: Other World Fluffy Cafe

description.en: Taichi Arima is overworked at his day job. One day, going home late due to working overtime, he saves a fluffy white cat from being run over. He gains a special "Tame" ability and is transported to another world. With such a strange ability, what will he do... Why, open a Fluffy Cafe, of course!

title.en: Yarinaoshi Reijou wa Ryuutei Heika wo Kouryaku-chuu

altTitles.en: The Do-Over Damsel Conquers the Dragon Emperor
The Returnee Noble Lady in the Middle of Conquesting His Majesty the Dragon Emperor

altTitles.es: ¡Vence al Emperador Dragón en esta ronda, Señorita!

altTitles.zh: 重生大小姐正在攻略龙帝殿下

altTitles.en: Win Over the Dragon Emperor This Time Around, Noble Girl!

altTitles.vi: Tiểu Thư Trùng Sinh chinh phục Long Đế Bệ Hạ
小姐重生征服龍帝陛下 (Nom Script)

altTitles.id: Seorang Putri Yang Kembali Ke Masa Lalu Sedang Menaklukkan Kaisar Naga

description.en:
The curtains rise on the tale of a young lady who once stormed the battlefields now getting to start her life all over again!  
  
The young noblewoman, Jill, was sentenced to death by her fiancé, the Crown Prince. Just as she was on the brink of death, time rewinds back to when she was 10 years old, to the party where her engagement had been decided!   
  
Determined to avoid going down the same path to ruin, Jill hastily proposes to the person behind her, only to discover that he’s none other than Hades, the Emperor of the neighboring kingdom who’s (set to) fall into darkness, ergo the worst villain.
description.id:
Jill Savelle- seorang tunangan dari pangeran putra mahkota Gerald de Kleitos yang memiliki gelar "Dewi Perang"- telah diburu oleh negaranya sendiri yang telah dilindunginya. Dikhianati oleh pasangannya sendiri, dia difitnah sebagai sorang penghianat kemudian dijebloskan kedalam penjara. Di waktu-waktu terakhirnya, Jill memiliki banyak penyesalan, tapi ketika ajal sedang menjemputnya, dia tiba-tiba saja terbangun pada saat 6 tahun lalu. Dan kali ini, dia telah bertekad untuk tidak diperalat lagi.

Sekarang, sebagai seorang gadis berusia 10 tahun, Jill memutuskan untuk melarikan diri dari pertunangan dengan pangeran yang menghampirinya. Dan pada akhirnya, dia secara tidak sengaja melamar pria berumur 19 tahun yang dikenal sebagai kaisar naga hades theos rave, yang nantinya akan menghancurkan negaranya. Tapi tanpa disangka, dia malah menerima lamarannya!

Berbanding terbalik dengan ingatan Jill yang dulu, sekarang Jill melihat kalau Hades yang saat ini merupakan seorang kaisar yang sedang tidak beruntung.  Jadi bisakah Jill mencegah sang kaisar terjatuh kedalam jurang kegelapan? ataukah malah nasibnya sudah tidak bisa diubah lagi?

altTitles.en: Where's My Lovely Sweetheart?

altTitles.ja: 素敵な彼氏

description.en:
[from lost-translations]  
  
“I want a boyfriend!”  
  
Kozakura Nonoka always fancied having a boyfriend. Upon entering high school, she was certain that she was finally going to get one, but fast-forwarding eight months to December, she was still single as ever. Desperate, she attended a goukon (a group blind date) where she met Kiriyama Naoya, whose first words to her was “You’ll never get a boyfriend.”  
  
Now, what would this strange meet-up lead to?

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Shojo in 2018**

title.en: The Villainess Just Wants To Live In Peace!

description.en:
I transmigrated as the villainess of a novel.

I wanted to get rid of my death flag and live in peace, but apparently I’ve already been whipping and tormenting the final villain. I wasn't the one who did it, but since I still felt responsible for it, I’ve been taking care of him, and the villain's loyalty towards me keeps increasing.

I just want to enjoy my wealth and honor in peace.
I don't know why the story keeps going astray!

title.en: Mobile Suit Gundam Side Story - The Blue Destiny

altTitles.ja: 機動戦士ガンダム外伝 THE BLUE DESTINY

altTitles.ja-ro: Kidou Senshi Gundam Gaiden: The Blue Destiny

description.en: Mobile Suit Gundam Side Story: The Blue Destiny is a one volume manga based on the Sega Saturn game developed by Bandai, written and illustrated by Takayama Mizuho, published by Kodansha and serialized by Comic Bom Bom in 1997. The story revolves around Yuu Kajima, who is a soldier with the Earth Federation Forces during the One Year War, testing new technology before it's mass-produced. During a routine battle, he and his teammates come under attack from a mysterious blue Mobile Suit that attacks like a monster, barely escaping with their lives. Returning to base, Yuu is assigned to pilot that same machine - Blue Destiny. As he uses his new machine and clashes with Zeon ace Nimbus Schterzen, Yuu learns that there may be more to the enigmatic Blue Destiny and its EXAM System than he previously thought.

altTitles.en: Fifth academy

altTitles.ja: アイデンティティⅤ

description.en:
[This series contains references, terms, and characters related to the game Identity V, would be recommended to be familiar with the lore and/or played the game]

The new school year has begun! Dear hunters and survivors, let's have a wonderful time this year shall we?
This series revolves around comedic short stories with hunters and survivors, but in school!

altTitles.en: Orca Baby, the Mastermind
A Villainous Baby Killer Whale

description.en:
Calypso has experienced repeated reincarnation, and this is her 4th reincarnation. 

In her previous lives, she always died before she reached the age of 22 and returned to where everything started. During her 3rd life, she discovered that when a dragon goes on a rampage, it distorts dimensions. 

Determined to use this knowledge, she plans to exploit the dragon’s power to return to her original world. Currently, Calypso finds herself in a childcare story, where she encounters a man who she believes to be her father but the latter doesn’t recognize her. 

Seeking his help, Calypso involves her "father" and family in her quest, turning them into unwitting allies in her journey.
description.es-la:
Un día, un niño pequeño apareció ante mí. “¿Sabes dónde está la academia? ¡Tengo que ir ahí! “ “Has estado yendo en la dirección equivocada todo este tiempo. “ ” !!! “ “¿Qué está mirando, señor?” Supongo que esta es mi hija. "¿Quieres uno?" Pero no creo que ella sepa que soy su padre... Probablemente estés pensando eso, ¿verdad? ¡Si crees eso, estás equivocado, papá! Mi nombre es Calypso, un regresor cuatro veces. Mi vida se arruinó cuando poseí un personaje de novela. ¡Incluso tuve un hijo! ¡El tercer episodio de mi vida fue un final de masacre! '¡Ustedes XX chicos que están locos por esta protagonista femenina!' Sin embargo, por alguna razón, no importa lo que haga, no puedo pasar de mi cumpleaños número 22 y regresar a mi mundo. 
Sin embargo, accidentalmente encontré una manera en la tercera partida cuando el dragón se salió de control y murió. Cuando el dragón corre desenfrenado, ¡la dimensión se distorsiona! ¿Puedo volver a la casa en la que viví durante eso? La cuarta vez, cuando regresé nuevamente, decidí usar este dragón. ¿Abby? ¿Hermanos mayores? ¡Todo es solo un trampolín para encontrarte con el dragón! "¡Espera, dragón!" [Quiero morir ahora, pero me estoy volviendo loco con todos estos retornos repetidos.] [Mi familia está ligada a la familia real] [¿Alguien ha oído hablar alguna vez de los débiles?/ Sólo los más fuertes son felices]

altTitles.ja: ディザインズ

description.en:
Beyond the natural world lies a breed of abnormal beings... HA, or Humanized Animals. 
They are a hybrid of human and animal, "designed" at the genetic level. Possessing astonishing physical capabilities, 
these HA are deployed into scenes of intrigue by certain ambitious individuals, seeking to showcase their true value. 

For what purpose did humans design these beings? Behind it all lies a grand plan connected to the future of humanity!

altTitles.en: The Chaebeol's Youngest Son
The Youngest Son of Sunyang
Youngest Son of the Conglomerate
The Youngest Son of a Conglomerate
The Youngest Son of a Chaebol Family

altTitles.ja: 財閥家の末息子

altTitles.th: รีบอร์นริช

altTitles.fr: Le plus jeune petit fils du conglomérat

description.en: Having started from the bottom and worked his way to the top, Hyeonwoo finds himself betrayed by the royal family of Soonyang Group, the largest corporation in South Korea, after providing 13 years of dedicated service. Just when he thinks all his efforts have been made in vain and prepares to embrace his death, he suddenly wakes up in the body of Dojun Jin, the youngest grandson to the founder and CEO of Soonyang, having traveled back in time. Having been granted this second chance, Hyeonwoo begins to lay the foundation for his revenge against his evil relatives.

altTitles.en: Hirano And Kagiura

altTitles.ja: 平野と鍵浦

description.en: Basketball players. Bad boys who aren’t really bad boys. Roommates. Senpai-kouhai BL romance. It all started when Kagiura moved into the school dorms with what seemed to be a bad-boy upperclassman. But after he’s left in the tender care of his mother hen of a roommate, Hirano, it’s too much to ask for Kagiura not to fall in love…right?!

title.en: ISOUROU TENSHI - HAJIMETE NO CHIKYUU SEIKATSU

altTitles.ja: 居候天使～はじめての地球生活～

description.en: Mitsuhiro, who works for a loan shark, hits a girl on his way home. With no sign of movement or pulse, it seems all is lost. But then she suddenly comes back to life and stays at Mitsuhiro's house! It seems the girl is not human, and it's her first time living on Earth. Mitsuhiro ends up teaching her about "human life"... A comedy about a loan shark and a non-human girl living together in a slapstick stunt!

altTitles.ja: ヘルク

description.en:
The Demon King has been defeated, and now the Demon World is running a contest to choose his successor.   
A muscular and high-level human named Helck has joined and says that he wants to destroy all HUMANS. Is he serious?  
Red Vamirio, one of the Four Heavenly Kings of the whole Demon Empire, is monitoring the contest and can't believe this. What's the secret behind Helck and the human world?
description.pt: Helck é o herói que derrotou um dos reis demônio. Quando um rei demônio morre, um novo deve ser declarado. Isso é feito através de um torneio de artes marciais, onde o mais forte se torna o novo governante. Vamiro, um dos Grandes Reis Demônios, descobre que Helck é um dos participantes do torneio e tem ganhado todas as lutas! Qual poderia ser o motivo? Se um humano se torna o próximo rei demônio, o que isso significa para o reino demoníaco?

altTitles.en: Chained Soldier

altTitles.es: El esclavo de la élite de soldados de Mato

altTitles.en: Slave of the Hell Soldiers
Slave of the Magic Capital's Elite Troops

altTitles.ja: 魔都精兵のスレイブ

description.en:
The demon-filled dimension known as "Mato" has opened to threaten humanity, and a type of "peach" tree that grows there yields fruit that confers special powers to those who eat it, giving humanity a fighting chance, but this only works for women. As such, as protectors of humanity, women rise in social status while men are relegated to second-class citizens scraping for basic occupation and acknowledgment.   
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, a domestically crafty and laborious high school senior whose older sister was taken during a Mato event 5 years before; while lamenting the hardships of the life ahead of him, an event opens before him, and while being rescued from demons by Captain Kyouka of the Anti-Demon Corps, she confers him powers as her "slave" and turns him into a mighty beast mount that mows down the demons.   
  
However, there is a surprising price to pay for being her "slave"… and it's not him who has to pay it.
description.fr:
La dimension démoniaque connue sous le nom de "Mato" s'est ouverte pour menacer l'humanité, et une sorte de "pêcher" qui y pousse donne des fruits qui confèrent des pouvoirs spéciaux à ceux qui les mangent, donnant à l'humanité une chance de se battre, mais cela ne fonctionne que pour les femmes. Ainsi, en tant que protectrices de l'humanité, les femmes gagnent en statut social tandis que les hommes sont relégués à des citoyens de seconde zone qui se battent pour une occupation et une reconnaissance de base.  
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, une lycéenne rusée et laborieuse dont la sœur aînée a été enlevée lors d'un événement du Mato 5 ans auparavant ; alors qu'elle se lamente sur les difficultés de la vie qui l'attend, un événement s'ouvre devant elle, et alors qu'elle est sauvée des démons par le capitaine Kyouka du Corps Anti-Démon, elle lui confère ses pouvoirs d'"esclave" et le transforme en un puissant monticule animal qui fauche les démons.  
  
Cependant, il y a un prix surprenant à payer pour être son "esclave"… et ce n'est pas lui qui doit le payer.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/takemura4hey/)
description.ru:
Эта боевая фентезийная манга повествует о нескольких героинях, что защищают людей в альтернативном пространстве, именуемом Мато (Город Демонов).  


---
description.pt-br:
A dimensão cheia de demônios conhecida como "Mato" se abriu para ameaçar a humanidade, e uma espécie de "pessegueiro" que ali cresce produz frutos que conferem poderes especiais a quem os come, dando à humanidade uma chance de lutar, mas isso só funciona para mulheres. Como tal, como protetoras da humanidade, as mulheres ascendem no estatuto social, enquanto os homens são relegados a cidadãos de segunda classe, em busca de uma ocupação básica e de reconhecimento.

 Yuuki Wakura é um estudante do último ano do ensino médio, astuto e trabalhoso, cuja irmã mais velha foi raptada durante um evento em Mato, 5 anos antes; enquanto lamenta as dificuldades da vida que tem pela frente, um evento se abre diante dele, e ao ser resgatado dos demônios pela Capitã Kyouka do Corpo Anti-Demônio, ela confere a ele poderes como seu "escravo" e o transforma em uma poderosa montaria bestial. que destrói os demônios.

No entanto, há um preço surpreendente a pagar por ele ser seu “escravo”… e não é ele quem tem que pagar.

title.en: Meiou-sama ga Tooru no desu yo!

altTitles.en: Make way, Meiou-sama Coming Through!

altTitles.ja: 冥王様が通るのですよ！@COMIC

altTitles.en: Here Comes the King of the Underworld!

description.en:
Osamu, a young man, died at a young age due to an incurable illness. His second life was to drift as a spirit (demon) in an unknown world!

Osamu, who is hated by humans and unreasonably deprived of his life, hopes that he "does not want to die anymore." At that time, he gained the power of "life-sucking" that feeds on the vitality of others. In addition, he will resist the approaching "death" by using the science that he continued to learn on the bed in the previous life and the creative magic that makes the best use of his own dexterity.

He then met an immortal girl who was despaired by being tossed with life like himself.

"You tried to kill me, you guys are bad."

In order to live, we are leaning toward the "stealing side"...? An anti-heroic fantasy where a ghost who wants to live and a girl who can't die conflict with the world!

---

description.en: Despite the food shortages caused by famine, the mountain village where the protagonist Kai lives is able to pursue a somewhat better life than others by hunting wild animals. However, one day, a man who says he got lost in the mountains comes to the village. Kai is suspicious of the man, who refuses to make eye contact, but he and his family welcome him. That night, another uninvited beast though sneaks into the outskirts of the village...
description.es-la: Tercer año de la era Temmei. En medio de la escasez de alimentos provocada por la hambruna, el pueblo de montaña donde vive el protagonista Kaei consigue ganarse la vida algo mejor que los demás cazando animales salvajes. Un día, sin embargo, llega a la aldea un hombre que afirma haberse perdido en las montañas. El hombre se niega a mirar a Kaei a los ojos, pero él y su familia le reciben con los brazos abiertos. Esa noche, en las afueras de la aldea, entran más bestias no invitadas...

altTitles.ja: デカいはちの話

description.en: What if bees were big and fluffy? Like, really big and fluffy.

description.en:
In the second year of high school, Iori Kagami is a boy who doesn’t stand out. Some of the students dislike him because of their impression of his twin sister, Shiori, who is famous as the perfect idol of their whole grade.

With special permission, Iori lives in a US military base in Japan and works part-time as an interpreter. While working with Cheena, Iori’s talents are revealed and he starts to look around at the people around him.

This is a story about how Iori’s talents are revealed when he gets involved with Christina.
description.ja: クラスに超可愛いロシア人のチーナが転入してきた！たちまち人気者になるけど、日本語がわからない彼女は困って泣き出しそう。そんな時に頼れるのは、とある誤解で皆から嫌われている主人公・伊織のみ。米軍仕込みの通訳とフィジカルでチーナを救え！ついでにバカにしてきた連中にざまぁをかませ!!「小説家になろう」発！大人気学園ラブコメコミカライズ！　※「小説家になろう」は株式会社ヒナプロジェクトの登録商標です
description.ru: В класс перешла новая супер-милая ученица Тина! Она мгновенно стала популярной, но из-за того, что девушка совершенно не знала японского, она выглядела так, будто вот-вот заплачет. В первое время, главного героя Иори ненавидели все его одноклассники за то, что он был с ней знаком. Иори спасает Тину от злобных ребят, что говорят только на японском, с помощью своих лингвистических навыков! Теперь история будет разворачиваться вокруг двух главных героев, которые должны будут преодолеть языковой барьер!

altTitles.ja: バツハレ

description.en: The story begins with the protagonist, Wakou Ichiro, who decides to return home early from work to celebrate his second anniversary with his wife. But, when he opens the door of his house.... He finds his wife cheating on him! Although the marriage was short-lived, his life changes again when suddenly, a certain woman appears in front of him? Thus begins a new story, a new erotic comedy!
description.ja: ２度目の結婚記念日。仕事を終えて帰宅した和光市路が目撃したのは見知らぬ男と交わる妻の姿だった──！住み慣れた我が家、幸福な日々、そして愛する人を失った和光だったが、そんな彼の前に現れたのは…！？
description.vi: Câu chuyện bắt đầu khi nhân vật chính, Wakou Ichiro về nhà sớm để kỷ niệm 2 năm ngày cưới với vợ mình. Nhưng bất ngờ khi mở cửa ra thì... Anh phát hiện vợ mình đang làm tình với người đàn ông khác. Cuộc hôn nhân dù ngắn nhưng cũng làm cuộc sống của anh thay đổi một lần nữa. Bất ngờ một cô gái xuất hiện trước mặt anh, câu truyện vừa hài vừa lứng sẽ bắt đầu?
description.es-la: La historia empieza con el protagonista, Wakou Ichiro, quien decida regresar temprano a casa del trabajo para celebrar su segundo aniversario con su esposa. Pero, cuando abre la puerta de su casa... ¡Se encuentra a su esposa siéndole infiel! A pesar de que matrimonio duró muy poco, su vida vuelve a cambiar cuando de repente, frente a él se aparece cierta mujer... ¡Así comienza una nueva historia, una nueva comedía erótica!

altTitles.en: Secretly, Secretly; But Unable to Hide It
Hidden Love
My Secret Crush

description.en: That year, someone secretly wormed their way into Sang Zhi's heart and she fell in love with her brother's friend Duan Jiaxu. That older brother has beautiful peachy eyes and casually calls her a "kid". That spark of surprise when they first met made Sang Zhi want to slowly get closer to him, but the 7-year age difference felt like an insurmountable gap that she couldn't cross over. Not knowing when it started, the crush buried at the bottom of her heart sprouted, and slowly, it spread into his heart too...
description.zh: 那年，桑稚的心里偷偷地住进了一个人，喜欢上哥哥的朋友段嘉许，这个大哥哥有着好看的桃花眼，漫不经心的喊她“小孩”，初见的惊艳总是让桑稚忍不住想要靠近，但是7岁的年龄差仿佛又是他们无法逾越的鸿沟，不知从何时起，埋藏在心底的青涩暗恋逐渐发芽，慢慢地，也蔓延进了他的心里...【

altTitles.ja: 異世界もう帰りたい

altTitles.en: I Want To Go Back Home.

description.ja:
平凡なサラリーマン×異世界=しょんぼり転生…!?
普通に働き、普通にご飯を食べ、普通に寝る。そんな平凡なハッピーで物足りた日常を過ごすサラリーマン・下山口一郎。
ある日突然、英雄として異世界に召喚されたけど、評価は★1つのハズレガチャ扱い……。
「嗚呼、もう帰りたい……」下山口の明日はどっちだ──!?

altTitles.ja: 義理チョコ嫌いの男女

altTitles.en: A Man and a Woman Who Hate Obligatory Chocolates

altTitles.pt-br: Um homem e uma mulher que odeiam chocolates obrigatórios

description.en:
"You realize that these aren't just obligatory chocolates, right?"

Obligatory chocolate is the kind that you give to people you don't even like, just because it's a Valentine's Day tradition. Aya, a beautiful office lady who is often misunderstood because of her lack of visible emotions, was complaining about it to her boss Takaki, as they walked to the train station together after work. However, Takaki told her, "That's too bad, because I was really looking forward to getting chocolates from Aya, even if it's just obligatory…"

As they parted ways, Aya hands Takaki a box of chocolates. Takaki is confused, because he thought she didn't like giving out obligatory chocolates…

"Senpai, are you really that dumb?"

Winner of the 3rd Toaru Nichijou Manga Award, it's a sweet romantic comedy that will satisfy your heart and your sweet tooth!
description.pt-br:
Você percebe que estes não são apenas chocolates obrigatórios, certo?

Aya, uma bela moça de escritório que costuma ser mal interpretada por causa de sua falta de emoções visíveis, estava reclamando disso com seu chefe Takaki, enquanto caminhavam juntos para a estação de trem depois do trabalho. No entanto, Takaki disse a ela: 

"Isso é uma pena, porque eu realmente estava ansioso para ganhar chocolates de Aya, mesmo que seja apenas obrigatório..."

Ao se despedirem, Aya entrega uma caixa de chocolates a Takaki. Takaki fica confuso, porque pensou que ela não gostava de dar chocolates obrigatórios...

"Senpai, você é realmente tão burro?"

altTitles.en: The Genius Witch Lost MP.

altTitles.ja: 天才魔女の魔力枯れ

altTitles.pt-br: A Bruxa gênia perdeu seu MP

altTitles.vi: Nàng Phù Thủy Thiên Tài Hết Mana Rồi!

description.en: Nayu, the one in a million genius witch who has been the talk of the town, has run out of magic! The price for all the things she has been allowed to do because of her brilliance is coming back to the former genius witch like a boomerang... Then, she meets her past student "Komugi" who loves her very much. This is a boomerang love comedy of karmic retribution by a former genius witch who can't be left alone even though it stings a little, abandoned by her magical powers!
description.ja: 1mmでも図に乗った事がある元天才の君へ1万年に1人の天才魔女“ナユ”の魔力が枯れた！？天才ゆえに許されてきたあれやこれのツケが、今ブーメランのように突き刺さっていく…そんなナユが助けを求めたのは、自分のことが大好きな教え子の小麦くん。だいぶ痛いけどなんだか放って置けない奇妙な2人の共同生活が始まった！
description.pt-br: Nayu, aquela em um milhão de bruxas geniais que tem sido o assunto da cidade, ficou sem magia! O preço por todas as coisas que ela foi autorizada a fazer por causa de seu brilhantismo está voltando para a ex-bruxa genial como um bumerangue... Então, ela lembrou de seu ex-aluno "Komugi", que a ama muito. Esta é uma comédia de amor de retribuição cármica por uma ex-bruxa genial que não pode ser deixada sozinha, mesmo que doa um pouco, abandonada por seus poderes mágicos!

description.en: A dark gloomy castle with endless stairways and an ancient library. Scary, mysterious creatures live here, hiding in the night. One day, a girl who lost her memory ends up there. Who is she and how can she get back? And, most importantly, how will the owner of the castle decide her fate?

NTR in Another World: Sullying My Best Friend's Women With the Strongest Skill

description.en:
This shitty world that's nothing but a trashy game, he and I will definitely escape it together. So, all these annoying women trying to take advantage of him are just a nuisance. What's worse, it seems like he's beginning to have some feelings for them.

That's why, for his sake, I'll eat them up first. But, just what is this power…?
description.es: Este mundo de mierda que no es más que un juego basura, él y yo definitivamente escaparemos juntos. Entonces, todas estas mujeres molestas que intentan aprovecharse de él son solo una molestia. Lo que es peor, él parece que está comenzando a sentir algo por ellas. Por eso, por su bien, las comeré primero. Pero, ¿qué es este poder…?

description.en: A man purchases three little slaves and begins to groom them into perfect girls for his harem. You will never have a gaggle of lolis with horns in your life. ;_;
description.vi: Đây là câu chuyện về gã chủ nhân mua nô lệ, chăm sóc giáo dục các bé lên người để hiện thực hoá giấc mơ dàn harem lý tưởng
description.es-la: Un hombre compra 3 esclavas Lolis para así poder criarlas y convertirlas en mujeres de su agrado para que posteriormente cuando crezcan completamente de acuerdo a sus gustos pueda hacerles el sin respeto a gusto las veces que quiera
description.pt-br: Um homem compra três pequenas escravas e começa a transformá-las em garotas perfeitas para seu harém.

description.en: Pairing: Akai Shuichi x Furuya Rei

title.en: There Is No Forgiveness From the Regressed Lady

description.en:
Cassia, stripped of everything by her brother's lover and best friend, resolves to rewrite her twisted fate by traveling back in time. Her first objective: prevent her brother and the villainess from ever falling in love. Yet, she quickly discovers that altering human emotions, even with the ability to manipulate time, proves impossible.
In a moment of despair, a hero from the North emerges – Cain, the emperor's half-brother and a grand duke condemned to die for treason. Upon meeting him, Cassia instinctively understands: this man holds the key to reshaping her destiny, mirroring her own past struggles.
Now, Cassia must navigate the intricate threads of fate and love, with Cain at her side, to reclaim what was taken from her and forge a new path forward against all odds.
description.ko:
오빠의 연인이자 절친에게 모든 걸 빼앗긴 '카시아'.
과거로 돌아가 잘못된 운명을 만회하고자 한다. 

그렇게 세운 첫 번째 목표는 바로
오빠와 악녀의 연애를 막는 것!

하지만 회귀자조차도 바꿀 수 없던 것이 사람의 감정이었으니…

좌절의 순간,
그녀 앞에 북방의 영웅이 나타난다.

현 황제의 이복동생이자
반역죄로 몰려 처형당할 대공 '카인'.

과거에 자신과 같은 말로를 맞이한 요주의 인물을 보며,
그녀는 본능적으로 직감한다.

이 사람이 바로 운명을 바꿀 열쇠라는 것을.

Аля-сан иногда кокетничает со мной по-русски

altTitles.de: Alya verbirgt manchmal ihre Gefühle auf Russisch

altTitles.en: Alya Sometimes Hides Her Feelings in Russian
My Deskmate Alya Sometimes Hides Her Feelings in Russian

altTitles.ja-ro: Tokidoki Bosotto Roshia-go de Dereru Tonari no Alya-san

altTitles.pl: Alya Czasami Ukrywa Swoje Uczucia Używając Rosyjskiego

altTitles.mn: Аля Заримдаа Орос Хэлээр Сэтгэлээ Нуудаг

description.en:
"И на меня тоже обрати внимание..."

Alya, the incomparably beautiful silver-haired girl in the next seat over, occasionally mumbles to herself in Russian. She says she switches to it whenever she’s badmouthing me… but I know the truth! I know for a fact that she just said "Pay attention to me, too." to me! 

Masachika Kuze has native-level skills when it comes to Russian comprehension, but Alya has no idea about that... and that’s why she keeps on hiding those sweet feelings about him in her native language!
description.it: Masachika Kuze è seduto accanto ad Alya, una ragazza di origine russa e antenati giapponesi. Lei è bella, altezzosa e una studentessa eccezionale, mentre Masachika è secchione e noto per essere un fannullone. È un bersaglio facile per i suoi commenti in russo, che lei è fin troppo felice di tradurre - tranne per il fatto che lui può capire cosa sta dicendo in realtà!
description.ja: 「И на меня тоже обрати внимание」隣の席に座る絶世の銀髪美少女、アーリャさんは時々ロシア語を話す。本人は俺を罵倒していると言うのだが…事実は違う！さっきのロシア語、彼女は「私のことかまってよ」と言っていたのだ！実は俺、久世政近のロシア語リスニングはネイティブレベルなのである。そんな事とは露知らず、今日も甘々なロシア語でデレてくるアーリャさん！全生徒憧れの的、超ハイスペックなロシアンJKとの青春ラブコメディ！
description.mn:
Аля гэх, хэнтэй ч зүйрлэшгүй үзэсгэлэн, мөнгөлөг үстэй охин, заримдаа дотроо оросоор шивнэдэг. Тэр хэлэхдээ, намайг муулах үедээ л тэгдэг гэж хэлсэн...гэхдээ би орос хэл мэднэ! Саяхан "Надад анхаарал тавиач" гэж хэлэхийг нь би сонссон!

Масачика Күзэ орос хэлийг уугуул түвшний чадамжаар ойлгодог, гэвч Аля үүнийг мэдэхгүй...тийм болохоор өөрийнхөө сэтгэлийг орос хэлээр нуудаг!
description.pl: Masachika Kuze siedzi obok Alyi, dziewczyny pochodzenia rosyjsko - japońskiego. Jest piękną, wyniosłą i wyjątkową uczennicą, podczas gdy Masachika jest kujonem znanym z bycia leniem. Jest on więc łatwym celem dla jej komentarzy, które chętnie tłumaczy na rosyjski - z wyjątkiem tego, że on może zrozumieć, co mówi naprawdę!
description.ru: Манга по одноимённой новелле! Главный герой – Кудзе Масачика, учится в частном институте Сейрей, куда частенько попадают ученики из разных стран. Вдруг в классе Кудзе появилась новенькая. Девушка с бледной, почти прозрачной кожей, которую невозможно было увидеть у настоящих японцев, и длинными голубыми глазами-щелочками, сияющими, как сапфиры. Это была Аля – Русская девушка, что переехала в Японию...
description.vi:
“И наменятоже обрати внимание”

“Hở, gì thế?”

“Có gì đâu? Tôi nói ‘Cái tên này đúng là đồ ngốc’ ý mà.”

“Cậu thôi cái trò mắng người ta bằng tiếng Nga đi!?”

Arya - cô nàng xinh đẹp tuyệt trần có mái tóc bạch kim ngồi cạnh tôi - đang nở một nụ cười đắc thắng...

Nhưng sự thật thì, câu tiếng Nga cô ấy vừa nói có nghĩa là [Hãy để ý đến tôi đi] cơ!

Tôi - Kuze Masachika - là người có khả năng nghe hiểu tiếng Nga thông thạo như người bản xứ. Nhưng không hề hay biết điều đó, cô nàng Arya hôm nay vẫn tiếp tục thể hiện những cảm xúc rất ngọt ngào bằng tiếng Nga khiến tôi không thể ngừng cười!?

Câu chuyện tình thanh xuân hài hước của tôi với cô nàng nữ sinh trung học gốc Nga hoàn hảo đã bắt đầu như thế...
description.pt-br:
Minha colega de classe que senta ao meu lado é meio-russa, chamada Alya, ela tá sempre provocando e sussurrando em russo, só que ela não sabe que entendo muito bem o idioma russo. 

Assim começa um grande comédia romântica.

title.en: The Ghost and the Exhausted Office Worker

altTitles.ja: 幽霊と疲れた会社員

description.en:
A story about a ghost and the exhausted office worker he watches over as he gradually learns to find meaning in his life.

Original by [@yukiyuki_nkym](https://twitter.com/yukiyuki_nkym) on Twitter.

altTitles.en: Emperor and the Female Knight
The King and His Knight

altTitles.ja: 皇帝と女騎士

altTitles.vi: Hoàng đế và Nữ hiệp sĩ

description.en:
Pollyanna is an unremarkable girl in a noble family. Her parents send her to military conscription hoping she'll die quickly in battle. Left only with her wits and her strength, Pollyanna fights to rise up in the ranks. One day, she meets an ardent king, one who finally acknowledges her worth. Moved by his dream for unity, Pollyanna vows to fight for him. But now the young king is slowly realizing this stalwart knight has also conquered his heart.

---
After six years of pointless war between her country, the Kingdom of Ehas, and their neighbor enemies, the Kingdom of Cukda, aged 20, the woman soldier and former petty officer Pauliana Kellenbell has been defeated and captured in a storming attack by the army of another enemy nation, the Kingdom of Acrea, an attack she had personally predicted but fell on deaf ears by her superiors. She has been desperately trying to survive in men's society, but it was all in vain, her noble birthright having been taken away by her family by being sent to war, and having all her efforts crushed down by the fact that she's a woman in the all-male army of Ehas.

Acrea's young king, Lucius, sees her struggle and potential, and makes an unexpected offer. He dreams of becoming the first emperor to conquer the South continent and its sea. Pauliana swears a life-long allegiance to Lucius for acknowledging her, becoming his knight and most trusted advisor, bestowing her with the name Pauliana Winter. However, in the end, Lucius is just an emperor on the battlefield that had awakened his love for Pauliana!

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%99%A9%EC%A0%9C%EC%99%80-%EC%97%AC%EA%B8%B0%EC%82%AC/2332), [KakaoPage](http://page.kakao.com/home/52250831)

description.ja:
前妻との娘である「ポリアナ」は家族にとってただの邪魔もの――。
父はポリアナが戦死することを望み強制的に戦場に行かせるのだが…自分を見捨てた親への復讐と生き残るため必死に訓練し、疲弊した戦地の男世界でも耐えぬくポリアナ。
しかし、敵国の新王「ルクソス」が率いるアクレア軍の侵攻により、ポリアナは絶体絶命の危機に――!?
description.ko: “오늘따라 경이 귀여워 보이는구나.” “폐하, 어디 불편하십니까?” 미모와 능력을 갖춘 대륙의 패왕, 남자보다 거친 여기사에게 반하다?! 전우애가 연애로 발전하기까지, 진중함과 유머의 황금비로 풀어내는 새로운 스타일의 ‘여기사 로망’! 때는 전시, 여기사 폴리아나는 적국 아크레아의 군대에 패배한다. 그녀는 남자들의 사회에서 살아남기 위해 필사적으로 노력해 왔으나 이제는 허망히 죽을 신세. 하지만 아크레아의 젊은 왕 룩소스 1세는 그녀의 사투를 보고 뜻밖
description.tr: Pauliana, düşman ulus ordusu Acrea tarafından yenildi ve yakalandı. Umutsuzca erkekler toplumunda hayatta kalmaya çalışıyordu, ama hepsi boşunaydı. Acrea’nın genç kralı Lucius, mücadelesine tanık oldu ve beklenmedik bir teklifte bulundu. Onun hayali savaşı sürdürmek ve Güney kıtasını ve denizini fetheden ilk imparator olabilmekiti. Pauliana, Lucius’a, onu kabul ettiği için ömür boyu sürecek bir bağlılık sözü verdi. Ancak, sonunda, Lucius sadece Pauliana’ya olan sevgisini savaş alanında uyandırmiş bir imparatordu.
description.uk:
Пауліану подолали, і вона була захоплена у полон армією ворожої країни Акрії. Вона відчайдушно намагалася вижити в чоловічому товаристві, але все було марно. Молодий король Акрії, Люціус, побачив її боротьбу та зробив неочікувану пропозицію. Він мріє продовжити війну та стати першим імператором, що скорить Південний континент і море. Пауліана присягнула на вірність Люціусу за те, що він її визнав. Однак, зрештою, Люціус - просто імператор, який на полі бою усвідомив свої почуття до Пауліани.

---
